titlestmt.titleproper: Iain Campbell correspondence with Santosh Kumar, 1976-1978
titlestmt.author: David Hill

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by David Hill using EADitor ©2011

change.item: Imported into EADitor. Some normalization has occurred to apply EAD 2002 schema validation and conform to EADitor basic requirements.

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Iain Campbell correspondence with Santosh Kumar
did.abstract: Correspondence of Iain Campbell with dealer Santosh Kumar regarding the buying of coins and other items.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Correspondence of Iain Campbell of Weeping Water, Nebraska, with dealer Santosh Kumar of New Delhi, India, regarding the buying of coins, stones, and other items. Includes invoices.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Iain Campbell correspondence with Santosh Kumar, 1976-1978, Archives, American Numismatic Society.

userestrict.head: Restrictions
userestrict.p: Copyright restrictions may apply. Permission to publish or reproduce must be secured from the American Numismatic Society.
